data.title: Keynote & Motivational Speaker, Workshop Facilitator, Mastermind Coach
data.meta_description: Dr. Jason Richardson delivers Keynotes and Workshops on using the power of your mind to become a champion in business, sport, and life.
data.text:
"When searching for a keynote presenter for the 2020 Sailing Leadership Forum, US Sailing was looking for someone from a sport background who can inspire the leaders of the sailing community to work together to achieve success both individually and as part of a team. Dr. Richardson took the time to understand the sailing community to make the session relevant and impactful. He asked questions, did his own research and came to the event prepared to deliver. Jason’s keynote presentation delivered exactly what the sailing community needed to hear. He inspired the audience on a personal level to analyze their own belief system and determine what is holding one back from growth. At a team leadership level he delivered a message of finding clarity, purpose and working together to achieve success. Attendee feedback was overwhelmingly positive. Some session evaluation comments included “Interactive, engaging, funny, and relevant as we all work to do our best to progress this sport in a variety of communities and along a mix of pathways.” “inspiring” “empowering” “energetic” “engaging” “I felt personally recharged. He knows what makes us tick. And how to share that in a way to pry my aperture open for learning” We look forward to inviting Dr. Jason Richardson back to present at future events! "

Katie Ouellette - US Sailing

Membership Engagement Director

"Dr. Richardson has the proven ability to improve the performance of both individuals and organizations. Whether your a sales team wanting to make more sales, a training/H.R. division wanting to improve productivity or an Olympic athlete competing for a Gold Medal, Dr. JRich has the track record you are looking for. He has the rare ability to take the psychology needed for success and put it into action. He does this not only in his own life but in the lives of his clients. If you are playing to win, Dr. JRich is someone you want on your team!"

Dr. Bill Redford

Charter School Developer
